Frequently Asked Questions

Sab questions ke jawab yahan hain

Winter special offer hai! Regular price ₹2,000 hai, lekin hum chahte hain ki har business online aaye. Isliye limited time ke liye ₹500 mein quality website de rahe hain.

Kyunki modern websites ko modern technology chahiye! Next.js super fast loading, better SEO, aur smooth performance deta hai. Tailwind se aapki website har device pe perfect dikhti hai. HTML purana technology hai - hum future-proof websites banate hain.

Aapko apna custom domain milega - jaise yourname.siteget.in. Iska koi extra charge nahi hai! Baad mein agar chahe toh apna .com domain bhi connect kar sakte ho.

Usually 3-5 days mein aapki website live ho jayegi. Simple websites 2 days mein bhi ready ho jati hain. Aur haan - free setup bhi included hai!

Bilkul! Har website fully responsive hoti hai. Matlab mobile, tablet, laptop - har screen pe perfect dikhegi. Ye modern Tailwind CSS ka kamal hai.

Haan! Initial setup ke baad bhi aap changes request kar sakte ho. Pricing alag se discuss karenge based on changes.
